description: Cardinal Jorge Mario Bergoglio of Argentina is known as a humble man who spoke out for the poor and led an austere life in Buenos Aires.
title: The First Latin American and the First Francis
title_page: The First Latin American and the First Francis - The New York Times
text:
A gathering of Roman Catholic cardinals picked a new pope from among their midst on Wednesday â€” choosing a cardinal from Argentina, the first South American to lead the church.
The new pope, Jorge Mario Bergoglio (pronounced ber-GOAL-io), will be called Francis, the 266th pontiff of the church.
